upside-down-tools.description: This pack will make all your tools and weapons look upside down.

vanilla-collective-brown-hearts.author: Verday
vanilla-collective-brown-hearts.description: Changes the HUD heart textures to be a nice brown color.

vanilla-collective-gray-hearts.author: Verday
vanilla-collective-gray-hearts.description: Changes the HUD heart textures to be a nice gray color.

vanilla-collective-rising-block-destroy-.author: Verday
vanilla-collective-rising-block-destroy-.description: Changes the block breaking animation to a rising sweep animation.

vanilla-connected-glass.author: sniffercraft34
vanilla-connected-glass.description: Connected Glass that does not require OptiFine and works with any resource pack!

vanilla-imagined.author: ThatGuyMiki
vanilla-imagined.description: New elegant way to view minecraft ui, and more.
vanilla-imagined.title: Vanilla Imagined

variants-cakes.author: Momiji_Hozuki
variants-cakes.description: Adds 25 cake variants - milk and chocolate glazes with sweet or glow berries.

Enhances all enchanted books and gives every enchantment a unique texture!

Formerly vipers enchantment overhaul

visible-powdered-snow.author: MasterofDeath
visible-powdered-snow.description: This texture pack makes powdered snow a bit more blue, so that you never fall into powdered snow ever again.

visible-shield-cooldown-rp.author: Bluebird
visible-shield-cooldown-rp.description: Shows you the status of your shield on cooldown (when it is disabled)

waystones-pbr.description: Waystones with emissive and bump mapping
waystones-pbr.title: Waystones PBR

whimscape-better-mace.description: This (unofficial) add-on pack makes the Whimscape  Mace  Better!

white-enchantment-glint.description: Changes the color of the enchantment glint to white.

wobblydistortion.author: SilentPaltos
wobblydistortion.description: Makes your world wobbly and distorted. Sometimes it looks like a fuzzy AI-generated video

x-ray.author: AlphaLeoli
x-ray.description: You can now see ores in spectator mode!
